name: Parkour Tower
description: A 3D TOWER CLIMBER WHERE YOU ARE RACING AGAINST THE RISING LAVA TO GET TO THE TOP, IN A FIRST PERSON VIEW. EACH FLOOR HAVING IT OWN MAZE LIKE ENVIRONMENT WHERE YOU RUN THREW THE MAZE AS FAST AS POSSIBLE BEFORE THE LAVA GET YOU. WITH THE GOAL OF REACHING THE TOP OF THE TOWER AND COLLECTING THE GEM OF POWER TO REVERT EVERYTHING BACK.(SURVIVAL PARKOUR)
